text: Need Riley Evans for Pizza Hut campaign. Budget around $9,470, looking for 1 x Facebook post, 2 x TikTok video, 2 x Radio interview, 3 x YouTube short, 1 x 10-minute unboxing. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
